```
API_ROOT = 'https://t-hole.red/_api/v1/'
def post(text:str,token:str)->requests.Response:
    â€˜å‘å¸ƒtextâ€™
    POST_URL = API_ROOT + 'dopost'
    data = {
        'cw' : '',
        'text' : text,
        'allow_search':0,
        'use_title':0,
        'type':'text'
            }
    headers = {
        'user-agent':r'Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/96.0.4664.93 Safari/537.36',
        'User-Token':token,
              }

    req = requests.post(url=POST_URL,data=data,headers=headers)
    return req
```

Re Alice:
```
API_ROOT = 'https://t-hole.red/_api/v1/'
def comment(text:str,token:str,pid:int)->requests.Response:
    'å›å¤pidæ¡textå†…å®¹'
    COMMENT_URL = API_ROOT + 'docomment'
    headers = {
        'user-agent':r'Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/96.0.4664.93 Safari/537.36',
        'User-Token':token,
              }
    data = {
        'pid' : pid,
        'text' : text,
        'use_title': ''
            }
    
    req = requests.post(url=COMMENT_URL,data=data,headers=headers)
    return req
```
